com.neovisionaries.android.opengl
Interface GLES

All Known Implementing Classes:
GLESImpl11, GLESImpl20, GLESImplBase
public interface GLES

OpenGL ES interface.

An implementation of this interface can be obtained by GLESFactory.getInstance().

Author:
Takahiko Kawasaki
See Also:
GLESFactory.getInstance()
